type="text/css">
    .payment-element {
        padding: 10px;
    }
</style>

<form id="payment-form" data-secret="${functions.htmlEncode(input.customFields.client_secret)}" data-resulturl="${functions.htmlEncode(input.resultURL)}">
  <div id="payment-element" class="payment-element"></div>
  <div id="payment-errors" role="alert"></div>
  <button id="submit" class="cx-payment-link btn btn-primary" type="submit">${functions.htmlEncode(vars.payButtonLabel)}</button>
</form>

<script>
(function (Opf, Stripe) {
    const DEBUG = true;
    const VERSION = '0.0.2';
    const log = (data) => {
        DEBUG && console.log(data);
    }

    /**
     * Initialize stripe js - using Stripe Elements
     */
    const initStripe = () => {

        log('OPF - Stripe Hosted Fields - OPF script version:' + VERSION + ' - Stripe JS version:' + Stripe.version);
        const stripe = Stripe('${functions.jsEncode(vars.publickey)}', {
            locale: 'auto',
        });
        const paymentForm = document.getElementById('payment-form');
        const secret = paymentForm.dataset.secret;

        const elements = stripe.elements({clientSecret: secret});
        const style = {
            base: {
                color: "${functions.jsEncode(vars.cardColor)}",
            }
        };
        const paymentElement = elements.create("payment", {
            style
        });
        paymentElement.mount("#payment-element");
        paymentElement.on('change', function(event) {
            handleError(event.error);
        });
        return {
            stripe,
            elements,
            paymentElement
        };
    }


    /**
     * Confirm card payment, this will confirm the Stripe PaymentIntent with 3DS support.
     * See https://stripe.com/docs/js/payment_intents/confirm_card_payment
     * @param {object} stripe 
     * @param {object} paymentElement 
     * @param {string} paymentIntentId
     * @param {string} secret
     */
    const confirmPayment = (stripe, paymentElement, paymentIntentId, clientSecret) => {
        const paymentForm = document.getElementById('payment-form');
        const resultUrl = paymentForm.dataset.resulturl;
        return stripe.confirmPayment({
            elements: paymentElement,
            clientSecret,
            confirmParams: {
              return_url: resultUrl,
            },
            redirect: "if_required"
        }).then((result) => {
            const hasError = handleError(result.error);
            if (hasError) {
                log(result.error);
                Opf.payments.checkout.throwPaymentError();
                return;
            }
            return doSubmit(paymentIntentId);
        });
    }

    /**
     * Submit payment to OPF.
     * @param {string} paymentIntentId 
     */
    const doSubmit = (paymentIntentId) => {
        return Opf.payments.checkout.submit({
            'additionalData': [{
                    'key': 'paymentIntent',
                    'value': paymentIntentId
                },

            ]
        });
    }

    const handleError = (error) => {
        let displayError = document.getElementById('payment-errors');
        if (error) {
            displayError.textContent = error.message;
            log('Stripe error: ' + error.message);
            return true;
        } else {
            displayError.textContent = '';
            return false;
        }
    }

    const listenOnSubmit = (stripe, elements, paymentElement) => {
        const paymentForm = document.getElementById('payment-form');
        console.log("paymentForm", paymentForm)
        paymentForm.addEventListener('submit', function (ev) {
            ev.preventDefault();

            elements.submit().then(function (result) {
                
                const secret = paymentForm.dataset.secret;
                // https://stripe.com/docs/js/payment_intents/retrieve_payment_intent
                stripe.retrievePaymentIntent(secret).then(function (result) {
                    const hasError = handleError(result.error);
                    if (hasError) {
                        Opf.payments.checkout.throwPaymentError();
                        return;
                    }
                    const paymentIntent = result.paymentIntent;

                    confirmPayment(stripe, elements, paymentIntent.id, secret).then(() => {
                        log('Stripe payment completed');
                    }).catch((e) => {
                        log('Error while processing Stripe payment');
                        console.log(e)
                        Opf.payments.checkout.throwPaymentError();
                    }).finally(() => {
                    });
                });

            }).catch(function (submitError) {
                handleError(submitError);
            });


        });
    }

    const {
        stripe,
        elements,
        paymentElement
    } = initStripe();
    listenOnSubmit(stripe, elements, paymentElement);
})(window.Opf, window.Stripe);
</script>","afterRedirectHtml":"<script>
